verbose_text: GRHL2 is not normally expressed in the corneal endothelium in vivo; however, in PPCD4 diseased corneal tissue, we detect GRHL2 in the corneal " endothelium " supporting the hypothesis that the PPCD4 variants result in inappropriate activation and ectopic expression of GRHL2.
evidence: PPCD4 variants result in inappropriate activation and ectopic expression of GRHL2
